author: jerenkrantz
msg: Fix "connection" hang where we would not re-queue requests that are held
(These add'l requests would need to come in after we have detected the
close on the connection and already moved everything over in reset_connection.)
(serf__open_connections): Re-attach held requests to the end of the
request chain after we go back into the connected state.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Fix infinite loop when we have multiple connection resets or SIGPIPE errors due to
(This is easiest seen on debian/stable when running under gdb against localhost.)
(reset_connection): Always clear out hold_requests chain when conn is reset.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: * README: Document PREFIX parameter for scons build.
